ContactUs.contactInfo: We’d love to hear from you!
ContactUs.contactInfoDesc: Whether you have a question, need support, or want to share your language learning journey, we’re here to help. Choose the method that works best for you to get in touch with us:
ContactUs.phoneDesc: Prefer to call? You can reach us at
ContactUs.available: Saturday to Thursday, 9 AM to 6 PM.
ContactUs.comingSoon: We will be there for you soon
ContactUs.generalEmail: For any questions or feedback, email us at:
ContactUs.supportEmail: Need assistance? Reach our dedicated support team at:
ContactUs.connectForm: If you’d like to get in touch with our teachers directly, please fill out the contact form available on our
ContactUs.faqsDesc1: Looking for quick answers? Check out our FAQ page for solutions to common questions.
ContactUs.socialDesc: Stay connected with us for updates, tips, and inspiration:
ContactUs.promiseDesc: We strive to respond to all inquiries within 48 hours. Your feedback is invaluable to us and helps improve our services.

SideBar.websiteDescTitle: Tiara Academy | Your All-in-One Language Learning Solution
SideBar.websiteDesc: Tiara Academy specializes in providing a complete language learning experience with offline and online video courses, professional writing services for feedback and improvement, and reading services to enhance comprehension and fluency. Our expert resources and tailored support make achieving your language goals easier than ever.
SideBar.haveToLogin: You must be logged in to use website's features
